oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Buchanan Players, 1978
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Members of the Buchanan Players, the campus dramatic club

The Buchanan Players was a campus organization that provided a workshop environment for students in the theater arts. They performed new plays and also produced and directed their own plays to obtain parts not available in main stage productions. The purpose of the club was to train students in dramatic production and to prepare members for the national dramatic fraternity, Alpha Psi Omega.

David James, Cheri Hancock, Joe Peck, Shirln Sohrab, Kathy Metheny, Theresa Floyd, Pat Anderson, Kathy Bryan, Tricia Rogers, Dorethe Tucker (faculty sponsor), Suzanne Phillips, Steve Steele, Willams Jones, Bob Young, Bob Forsythe, Virginia Donnell, Tom Meador, Diane Blackwell, Kina Steed, Tim VanHook, Tricia Nauen, Lisa Davis, Rork Harrell, James Gerald Dunn, David Cummings, Joe Selph, Gwen Kirkbeminde, Martin McGeachy, Cindy O'Brien, Vicki Jennette.
